name: R5-SearchComparator-R4-SearchComparator
title: Concept map to convert a FHIR R5 SearchComparator into a FHIR R4 SearchComparator

element.display: the value for the parameter in the resource is approximately the same to the provided value.

target.display: the value for the parameter in the resource is approximately the same to the provided value.

element.display: the value for the parameter in the resource ends before the provided value.

target.display: the value for the parameter in the resource ends before the provided value.

element.display: the value for the parameter in the resource is equal to the provided value.

target.display: the value for the parameter in the resource is equal to the provided value.

element.display: the value for the parameter in the resource is greater or equal to the provided value.

target.display: the value for the parameter in the resource is greater or equal to the provided value.

element.display: the value for the parameter in the resource is greater than the provided value.

target.display: the value for the parameter in the resource is greater than the provided value.

element.display: the value for the parameter in the resource is less or equal to the provided value.

target.display: the value for the parameter in the resource is less or equal to the provided value.

target.display: the value for the parameter in the resource is less than the provided value.

element.display: the value for the parameter in the resource is not equal to the provided value.

target.display: the value for the parameter in the resource is not equal to the provided value.
